## JsPlumbListManager class

Provides methods to create/destroy scrollable lists.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class JsPlumbListManager 
```

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addList(el, options)](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblistmanager.addlist.md) |  | Configure the given element as a scrollable list. |

|  [removeList(el)](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblistmanager.removelist.md) |  | Destroy any scrollable list associated with the given element. |
